definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be bent, crooked (NH id., Pi. Nithp.; Aram. [[עַוֵּית]] Pa.; cf. 9at, 9to0 deceive PS:3008);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: make crooked = falsify, scales Am 8:5; pervert justice ([[מִשְׁפָּט]], [[חֶדֶק]]) Job 8:3, Job 8:3, Job 34:12 (all God subj.); c. acc. pers. subvert (i.e. deprive of justice), [[אָדָם בְּרִיבוֹ]] ´[[לְע]] La 3:36, cf. Ps 119:78; so [[עִוְּתָָנִי]] Job 19:6 (´[[י]] subj.).
bend, make crooked, [[דֶּרֶח רְשָׁעִים]] Ps 146:9 (´[[י]] subj.); in gen. Ec 7:13 (God subj.; opp. [[תִּקֵּן]]).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְהִתְעַוְּתוּ]] Ec 12:3 and the strong men bend themselves.
